game.name: Boxing Superstars KO Champion
game.description:
Boxing Superstars KO Champion brings the ultimate action into a fun-filled online platform! Step into the ring and be prepared to face off the biggest fighting challenge of your life in this brand new sports game! Your enemies are very powerful and you have to keep dodging their attacks and punches until you take them out of the ring. Defeat all your dangerous opponents one by one and get a chance to become the next knock-out champion today!

There are 20 unique and challenging levels to play through in this awesome HTML5 arcade-style boxing simulation game. Behave like a pro fighter and take down all your rivals to win all rounds! Be careful and try to use your moves wisely and time your attacks to take advantage over your rivals! The key mantra to survive for long in the ring is to block and predict the attacks of your enemies with open eyes. Make a strategy to bring the powerful special attack into use to knock your rival in a single blow in this boxing game!

Make sure to wear your gloves before entering the ring so that you can use jab, cross and uppercut wisely. Your audience is ready to cheer you up. Try to show off your intense fighting abilities to improve your fans base! Beat your rival to win in the present level and unlock the advanced ones! Track yours and your opponentâ€™s health bar by looking at the top of the game screen! Keep your eyes on the attacks of your opponent and hit them when their guard is down! Your performance will help you to secure stars. Give try our other popular titles from the huge collection of free new boxing games to go on a new action-adventure and have fun without download!
